Everyone in the world has to practice gratitude daily - Gratitude is a powerful emotion that can bring numerous benefits to individuals and society as a whole. By making it a daily practice, people would cultivate a positive mindset, improve their mental health, and foster stronger relationships.

Embrace lifelong learning - In today's rapidly changing world, it's essential to stay curious and adaptable. By making lifelong learning a rule, people would be encouraged to pursue knowledge and skills throughout their lives, leading to personal growth and societal progress.

Connect with nature every day - With the increasing urbanization and digitalization of our lives, many people are disconnected from nature. By making it a rule to spend time in nature every day, people would benefit from improved mental health, creativity, and a deeper appreciation for the natural world.

Practice random acts of kindness - Acts of kindness can have a profound impact on individuals and communities. By making it a rule to perform random acts of kindness every day, people would cultivate a sense of empathy and compassion, leading to a more caring and supportive society.

Use technology to enhance, not replace, human interaction - With the rise of social media and other digital communication tools, it's easy to forget the importance of face-to-face interaction. By making it a rule to use technology to enhance, rather than replace, human interaction, people would foster deeper connections and a more empathetic society.
